name: TFC
tagline: the Trading and Finance Club at PHS
body:
# Trading and Finance Club
***

## Trading stocks and options
President: Luke Aslanian
Sponsor: Mr. Benson

http://leadersinvestmentclub.com/about-the-club/

# Introduction to me, Mr. Benson
- What we'll talk about: getting everyone to practice trade, understand financial topics, and understand how to invest with a high probability of success.
- Practice account: everyone either make a td ameritrade practice account (papermoney) or a trademonster papertrade account.

# Talk about what I do, Tastytrade
- Statistical, probability based trading

# What they can start on:
- *Where Do I Start* beginning series.
- Future stars: http://www.tastytrade.com/tt/shows/future_stars/episodes/130715_future_stars

Maybe bring people in, like Mr. Wright and ask Mr. Benson his story...

# Contact Luke
(928).379.1030

We would love to have you talk about investing, trading, finance, etc. to our club! Or you may even like to sit in and hear how much we know about stocks and options trading...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
